title: Why the Duo option
body:
Just wondering if there is a reason for having Solo/'Duo' when we have Flex...
Why not just have Solo-Q.... and Flex-Q
So if you want to play with someone else (ie. be carried... lel).... Flex.
It would eliminate the Duo MMR loophole to get a higher skilled player on your team.
Is the sole reason Bot lane?{{item:2009}}

replies.body:
It is sick a valid point IMO. Why do you need a duo? It's almost a huge advantage usually. I know the matchmaking considers the duo to even the teams up but really? Why the need for it. Solo questions should just be that.....
It makes your solo elo just that. ....

Yes
I have encountered quite a few people who duo with 'smurf' accounts of much better players to win more... then the friend 'smurf' will feed back to their preferred bronze elo... makes a mockery of what should be a solo skill queue.
Given that queue health is already not great with flex... why not boost its appeal by making duos play flex?
Because at least with a duo there can be some form of communication instead of complete chaos, I mean shaco thrives in chaos and all with the anagram thing but still..
